com.mappedin.jpct.util

Class BitmapHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mappedin.jpct.util.BitmapHelper

  • public class BitmapHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class that offers helper methods related to Bitmaps. Currently, there's not much in it...

      • convert

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap convert(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable dable)
        Creates a Bitmap from a Drawable. This bypasses Android's BitmapFactory. However, Android is free to scale these resources on loading, so you might have to rescale them to fit. Prefer to put your images for textures into /raw if possible.
        Parameters:
        dable - the Drawable
        Returns:
        the bitmap

      • rescale

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap rescale(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                              int width,
                                              int height)
        Rescales a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the bitmap
        width - the new width
        height - the new height
        Returns:
        the rescaled bitmap
